name: UmbPack
help: UmbPack is a CLI tool to use in CI/CD to upload Umbraco .zip packages to the our.umbraco.com package repository.

properties.name: TargetPath
properties.help: The package.xml file or folder you want to create your package from

properties.name: OutputDirectory
properties.help: The directory the created package will be saved to

properties.name: Version
properties.help: Override the version defined in the package.xml file

properties.name: TargetPath
properties.help: Path to the package.zip file you wish to push

properties.name: DotNetVersion
properties.help: Change the required DotNetVersion for the package

properties.name: Current
properties.help: Make this package the current package file

properties.name: Archive
properties.help: One or more wildcard patterns to match against existing package files to be archived
